rows.label: qst104223_msg0001
rows.name:
Ding-dong! Rex-sensei!
I have a question!

rows.label: qst104223_msg0002
rows.name:
The other day, by the Village
Guardian, I found a piece of stone
with old letters carved on it.

rows.label: qst104223_msg0003
rows.name:
Can you read this squiggly
writing, Rex-sensei?

rows.label: qst104223_msg0021
rows.name:
Of course! I can read any
kind of old writing.

rows.label: qst104223_msg0022
rows.name:
Wow, Rex-sensei! If I study,
will I be able to read it too?

rows.label: qst104223_msg0023
rows.name:
You're a diligent student,
Martis, so I'm sure you'll
be able to read it.

rows.label: qst104223_msg0024
rows.name:
Okay! I'll do my best to
learn to read the letters
on the stone I found!

rows.label: qst104223_msg0041
rows.name:
Squiggly, huh... That might
be a little difficult.

rows.label: qst104223_msg0042
rows.name:
I see... I'll ask the history
teacher when they get here.

rows.label: qst104223_msg0043
rows.name:
You're a diligent student,
Martis, so I'm sure you'll
be able to read it.

rows.label: qst104223_msg0101
rows.name:
The class won't start
unless Rex-sensei is here.
